comments.author: Illconceived Was Na.9781
comments.body: Is there any easy way for the API to report its own status? And to distinguish between EU/US for this purpose? That way, any site/app using the API can tell its users right away that the data is inaccurate, without having to ask here, on Reddit, Facebook, Twitter, or in-game. Currently, players seem to think that the sites/apps are broken, when the root cause is server side.
